GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
ACPI: APEI: do not add task_work to kernel thread to avoid memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit b15911c52e6a7edce9990b03be06323a8729df53, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 7f17b4a121d0d50eca22cb1edebf0a157f3e43bf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ACPI: APEI: do not add task_work to kernel thread to avoid memory leak
